void ls_update_process ( ospf_state *  state,
ospf_nbr *  nbr,
tw_lp *  lp 
)

This function should only be called when we get an update message from an adjacency where we are in the exchange or loading state.

int process_lsa_recv ( ospf_state *  state,
ospf_nbr *  nbr,
ospf_db_entry *  r_dbe,
tw_lp *  lp 
)

This function processes a received LSA from one of our neighbors. If the lsa is newer than the one that our DB contains, we need to flood it to our neighbors.
